inertial-navigation-marine-robotics.title: Inertial Navigation in Marine Robotics
inertial-navigation-marine-robotics.description: An introduction to inertial navigation in marine robotics, from the sensors used to the mathematical tools needed to fuse that sensor data into a navigation solution

negotiation-http2-alpn-tls-handshake.title: Negotiating HTTP/2: ALPN and the TLS Handshake
negotiation-http2-alpn-tls-handshake.description: HTTP/2 in the browser uses ALPN to extend TLS by including the protocol negotiation in the exchange of hello messages. The client provides a list of protocols it speaks and the server responds with its selected protocol. No additional round-trip required.

improving-the-weather-on-twitter.title: Improving The Weather On Twitter
improving-the-weather-on-twitter.description: Using National Weather Service data and imagery to make a network of twitter bots that post regional radar GIFs with improved palettes and projections.
